drupalNodeEvent.title: Roundtable Panel: "Memory on Hands": Crafting Community Heritage and Indigenous Knowledge in Multiethnic Southwest China. Xiaomei Wang, Louisa Schein, Yu Luo

field_speakers.processed:
Xiaomei Wang, Director, Memory on Hands Museum;

Louisa Schein, Professor Emeritus, Anthropology and Women's and Gender Studies, Rutgers University;

Yu Luo, Associate Professor of Anthropology, University of Puget Sound

field_organizers.processed: University of Washington:  CAIIS (Center for American Indian and Indigenous Studies); China Studies Program, Henry M. Jackson School of International Studies

field_description.processed: A roundtable discussion by three experts on Southwest China on the roles of indigenous communities in relation to museums, tourism and culture heritage preservation efforts.  Please RSVP to jguedes@uw.edu to arrange for catering.
